title: Mastery Tokens on Aram
body:
Hi 

I love playing ARAM but today I got an S on {{champion:201}}  and {{champion:114}}  but did not receive their mastery 7 tokens. Are they not available on ARAM? Chests seems to be unlockable, as well as key shards.

Thanks!

replies.body: You can only get up to Mastery 5 on anything that isn't SR norms or ranked.

Thanks!

I really enjoy ARAM, I was hoping for a different answer...
Guess I'll travel more often to the rift
